pages.text: If $(thing)Players$() drive $(item)Boats$() on $(item)Ice$(), they will suddenly find themselves launching at speeds that they didn't think were possible. $(br2)This is a great way to travel from one area to another extremely fast. $(br2)While all types of $(thing)Ice$() will provide this effect when combined with $(item)Boats$(), $(item)Blue Ice$() will provide the fastest travel.
